verse: काषायान्न च भोजनादिनियमान्नो वा वने वासतो  व्याख्यानादथ वा मुनिव्रतभराच्चित्तोद्भवः क्षीयते । किं तु स्फीतकलिन्दशैलतनयातीरेषु विक्रीडतो  गोविन्दस्य पदारविन्दभजनारम्भस्य लेशादपि ।

terms.स्फीतकलिन्दशैलतनयातीरेषु: on the riverbanks of overflowing Kalindi
terms.पदारविन्दभजनारम्भस्य: of the one who starts worshipping the lotus feet
terms.Wearing a saffron: colored robe or not following the rules of eating, living in the forest, or giving explanations, observing the vow of mendicancy, these mental attributes get destroyed. However, even a tiny bit of involvement in playing on the riverbanks of overflowing Kalindi, in the beginning of worshipping the lotus feet of Govinda (Lord Krishna), is beneficial.
